ud1.1:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava uruvelayam viharati najja neranjaraya tire bodhirukkhamule pathamabhisambuddho.
ud1.1:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava sattaham ekapallankena nisinno hoti vimuttisukhapatisamvedi.
ud1.1:1.4: Atha kho bhagava tassa sattahassa accayena tamha samadhimha vutthahitva rattiya pathamam yamam paticcasamuppadam anulomam sadhukam manasakasi:
ud1.1:2.1: “Iti imasmim sati idam hoti, imassuppada idam uppajjati, yadidam—
ud1.1:3.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
